passive.name: PYROMANIA
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) PYROMANIA
                                After casting 4 abilities, the next offensive ability stuns enemies hit for 1/1.25/1.5s seconds.

q.name: (Q) DISINTEGRATE
q.description:
(Q) DISINTEGRATE
 4s   50/55/60/65 
                                
                                
                                Hurls a fireball that explodes in a small area, dealing 80 magic damage (80/130/180/230 + 85% ). Killing an enemy refunds Disintegrate's Mana cost and halves its Cooldown.

w.name: (W) INCINERATE
w.description:
(W) INCINERATE
 8s   70/80/90/100 
                                
                                
                                Releases a cone of fire that deals 70 magic damage (70/130/190/250 + 70% ) to all enemies within it.

e.name: (E) MOLTEN SHIELD
e.description:
(E) MOLTEN SHIELD
 14s   60 
                                
                                
                                Grants herself and Tibbers a shield that absorbing 50 damage (50/100/150/200 + 40% ) damage for 3 seconds, and gains 25/30/35/40% bonus Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds.

r.name: (R) SUMMON: TIBBERS
r.description:
(R) SUMMON: TIBBERS
 70/65/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Summons Tibbers, dealing 130 magic damage (130/230/330 + 60% ) to nearby enemies. For the next 20 seconds, Tibbers attack deals 110 magic damage (110/150/190 + 30% ).Tibbers Enrages (granting him 100% Movement Speed and 210% Attack Speed) when summoned after pouncing on an enemy, or when Annie dies.Recast: Order Tibbers to pounce on the target. The pounce cannot be blocked. Upon landing, Tibbers deals magic damage and knocks up the target upon landing.Tibbers Defense: 30/50/70.
